name: Sack 'n' Stack
description:
We made it into the house, Boys! 
Now we gotta get as much out of this heist as we can.
I'll hand you the goods and you load them onto the board!
But watch out! if you don't stack 'em nice and proper, 
stuff is going to fall off when we run from the cops. 
We gotta do this job all in one trip!

____________________________________________________________________________

INSTRUCTIONS

Click and drag with your mouse to choose only one of the two items the Boss fetches from inside the house and load it onto the board.
Try to make as solid a stack as possible, you will only have one trip to carry as much goods as possible! 

____________________________________________________________________________

Made for the GMTK Jam 2019 by these fine folks:

@_t3nshi - pixel art
@itsjustaidan - code
@sakana_cookies - music & SFX
@DasGereon - SFX & design
